If you're looking for a sword and sorcery-themed movie with a compelling plot and interesting characters, then "Troy" would be a great choice. It's an epic adaptation of Homer's epic poem, with a rich history and a thrilling narrative. 

If you're more interested in a romantic drama with a touch of humor, then "The Seduction of Joe Tynan" would be a perfect fit. It features a talented cast and a heartwarming story that will leave you smiling.

If you're looking for something more suspenseful and eerie, then "White Night" would be an excellent choice. The film features a great performance from a seasoned cast and a gripping mystery that will keep you guessing until the very end.
